entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kuujjuaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:10 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -34.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kuujjuaq Airport 08:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

Temperature: -34.9°C

Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -50
Dewpoint: -40.1°C

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 28.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 29.
